name.en: Humanities Application Special Topics: History Micro-curation
name.ch: 人文應用專題：歷史學微策展

goal.en: This course mainly guides students to acquire basic historical curatorial methods and knowledge from five aspects: subject methods, diverse historical materials, collection and investigation, performance skills, and citizen writing. Then, through practical exercises, they become familiar with the curatorial process, and At the end of the term, a micro-curated exhibition will be jointly exhibited.
goal.ch: 本課程主要從學科方法、多元史料、蒐藏調查、展演技藝及公民書寫五方面，引導學生具有基本的歷史學策展的方法與知識，進而透過實作練習，熟習策展的流程，並於期末聯合展出一檔微策展。
